mapper.update: update uporder_product set del_flag=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select up.id,up.product_name,left_limit_money,domain,up.discount,plan_html,refund_cal_way,buy_url from uporder_product up left join uporder_product_medium_text mt on up.id=mt.product_id left join sys_depart sd on up.sys_org_code=sd.org_code ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select distinct up.id,up.product_name,left_limit_money,domain,up.discount,plan_html,up.refund_cal_way,buy_url,uo.user_id from uporder_product up left join uporder_product_medium_text mt on up.id=mt.product_id left join sys_depart sd on up.sys_org_code=sd.org_code inner join uporder_order uo on up.id=uo.product_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
